local_intent: Approach and precisely align over the designated place spot, then verify position.
assumptions: place_spot is a valid target reference in the scene/world frame
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase: confirms object is held, retries precise ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.01, 3000 ms), and verifies arrival with IsAt. Fits between prior MoveAbove and subsequent contact/release steps.
